name: 彭朋群
objective:
機械學習是人工智慧重要的一部份，本課程將介紹機器學習在光電系統的應用，內容包含 1. 機器學習簡介及基本概念 2. 用於分類、迴歸和分群的機器學習演算法 3. 機器學習模型訓練、評估與最佳化技術 4. 機器學習在光電系統的應用。歡迎對人工智慧有興趣的同學加選。
1. Introduction and basic concepts of machine learning 2. Machine learning algorithms for classification, regression and clustering 3. Machine learning model training, evaluation, and optimization technology 4. Application of machine learning in optoelectronic systems
schedule:
1-3.     Introduction and basic concepts of machine learning 
4-8.     Machine learning algorithms for classification, regression and clustering 
9-13.   Machine learning model training, evaluation, and optimization technology 
14-18. Application of machine learning in optoelectronic systems
